thread.title: Jimmy ‘Superfly’ Snuka headed for trial in 1983 death of gf
thread.title_full: Jimmy ‘Superfly’ Snuka headed for trial in 1983 death of gf - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Jimmy ‘Superfly’ Snuka headed for trial in 1983 death of gf
text:
MATT SMITH/NJ Advance Media /Landov Wrestling legend Jimmy "Superfly" Snuka, 72, charged in the 1983 death of his girlfriend Nancy Argentino, appears Wednesday for a hearing at Lehigh County Courthouse in Allentown. ALLENTOWN, Pa. — Former professional wrestling star Jimmy “Superfly” Snuka will be heading to trial in the death of his mistress more than three decades ago.
Defense lawyers decided Wednesday to bypass a preliminary hearing in Lehigh County in exchange for grand jury transcripts and other evidence in the 1983 death of 23-year-old Nancy Argentino of New York.
FOLLOW THE DAILY NEWS SPORTS ON FACEBOOK. "LIKE" US HERE
Handout Snuka with Nancy Argentino. Sam Costanza/for New York Daily News Lorraine Salome has long suspected Snuka in the death of her sister, Nancy Argentino. Previous Next Enlarge Seventy-two-year-old Snuka of Waterford Township, New Jersey, is charged with third-degree murder and involuntary manslaughter. He will remain free on 10 percent of a $100,000 bail, pending trial.
Argentino was found dead in May 1983 after authorities were called to a Whitehall Township hotel room she was sharing with Snuka.
Astrid Stawiarz/Getty Images Snuka was charged recently in the 1983 death. Defense attorney Robert Kirwan II says Wednesday her death was “simply an unfortunate accident ... not murder.”
Related Stories Jimmy (Superfly) Snuka unfit for murder trial, lawyer says Jimmy (Superfly) Snuka charged with girlfriend’s 1983 murder Grand jury to probe 30-year-old death of wrestler's girlfriend
